uploadsFileUploadedTextContentElement.description:
Specify a builtin_text contentElement to be sent to the user after a file upload
example: #!builtin_text-OzpN5X (only builtin_text contentElements are supported)

Variables available:
 storage: 'local' or 's3'
 url: URL where the file has been uploaded
 originalName: Name that the file had on the user's computer
 mime: mime type of the file, example: 'image/gif'
 size: size from the file in bytes

User variables are also available at 'event.state.user' (only user variables are supported)

alwaysScrollDownOnMessages.description:
In case of news messages, even if the scrollbar is not at the bottom,
the chat will scroll down to show the new message

fileUploadPath.description: Destination of file uploads if S3 is not enabled

infoPage.description: The bot information page in the web chat

maxMessagesHistory.description: The number of messages that are displayed in the chat history

escapeHTML.description: Weather or not to escape plain html payload

chatUserAuthDuration.description: The duration of the authentication session when a user authenticate through this channel.

extraStylesheet.description: Path to an additional stylesheet. It will be applied on top of the default style

lazySocket.description: If true, Websocket is created when the Webchat is opened. Bot cannot be proactive.

disableNotificationSound.description: If true, chat will no longer play the notification sound for new messages.
